plays.text: Penalty to Todd Harvey 2 minutes for Tripping Dan Bylsma
Penalty to Jason York 2 minutes for Tripping Marco Sturm
Penalty to Mike Leclerc 2 minutes for Tripping Mike Rathje
Goal scored by Adam Graves assisted by Owen Nolan and Marcus Ragnarsson
Penalty to Bryan Marchment 2 minutes for Tripping German Titov
Penalty to Gary Suter 2 minutes for Hooking Andy McDonald
Penalty to Denny Lambert 2 minutes for High Sticking Brad Stuart
Penalty to Niclas Havelid 2 minutes for Interference Owen Nolan
Goal scored by Vincent Damphousse assisted by Adam Graves and Owen Nolan
Penalty to Vitaly Vishnevski 2 minutes for Hooking Mike Ricci
Penalty to Bryan Marchment 2 minutes for Crosschecking Paul Kariya
Penalty to Jason York 2 minutes for Holding Marco Sturm
Goal scored by Patrick Marleau assisted by Teemu Selanne and Owen Nolan
Goal scored by Samuel Pahlsson assisted by Andy McDonald and Dan Bylsma
